languages.text: "Уничтожить станцию — пусть Простор знает, какая судьба ждет пиратов, еретиков и мутантов".
languages.translation_comment: Все колонии получают HeriokhsRim_Destroyed_buff на +1 к Безопасности
Все колонии получают HeriokhsRim_Destroyed_buff на +1 к Безопасности

languages.text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."
languages.original_text: "Уничтожить станцию — пусть Простор знает, какая судьба ждет пиратов, еретиков и мутантов".

traits.locale_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits the mutants, pirates, and heretics."
"Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits the mutants, pirates, and heretics."
"Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits the mutants, pirates, and heretics."
"Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits the mutants, pirates, and heretics."
"Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."
"Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

languages.text: "Zerstört die Station. Lassen wir die Ausdehnung wissen, was Mutanten, Piraten und Ketzer erwartet."
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Zerstört die Station. Lassen wir die Ausdehnung wissen, was Mutanten, Piraten und Ketzer erwartet."

languages.text: « Détruisez la station. Que toutes les Étendues sachent ce qui pend au nez des mutants, pirates et autres hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Détruisez la station. Que toutes les Étendues sachent ce qui pend au nez des mutants, pirates et autres hérétiques. »

languages.text: «Destruyan la estación. Que toda la Extensión sepa el destino que aguarda a mutantes, piratas y herejes».
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

traits.locale_text: «Destruyan la estación. Que toda la Extensión sepa el destino que aguarda a mutantes, piratas y herejes».

languages.text: 「ステーションを破壊せよ。エクスパンスに、変異体、海賊、異端者にどんな運命が待ち受けているのかを知らしめてやれ」
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションを破壊せよ。エクスパンスに、変異体、海賊、異端者にどんな運命が待ち受けているのかを知らしめてやれ」

languages.text: “彻底摧毁这座星站，让整个科罗努斯扩区见证变种人、海盗、异端分子的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."

traits.locale_text: “彻底摧毁这座星站，让整个科罗努斯扩区见证变种人、海盗、异端分子的下场。”

languages.text: "İstasyonu yok edin. Mutantların, korsanların ve kâfirlerin sonlarının ne olacağını tüm Enginlik duysun."
languages.original_text: "Destroy the station. Let the Expanse know what fate awaits mutants, pirates, and heretics."
